bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXIX (No 2506)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Page Denys, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXIX (No. 2506). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 41.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1963, 8°, x-53 pp. et X pll.

C.R. par W.M. Calder III, CP 60 (1965) pp. 222-223. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 43 (1963) p. 411. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 44 (1964) p. 342. - J.A. Davison, JHS 85 (1965) pp. 197-198. - J. Irigoin, REG 78 (1965) p. 669. - H. Lloyd-Jones, CR N.S., 15 (1965) pp. 70-72. - É. des Places, Orientalia N.S., 33 (1964) p. 483. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 39 (1964) Nos 77-78, pp. 199-201. - Augusto Traversa, Paideia 20 (1965) pp. 354-355.
